price: Em seguida, depois de haverem visto os sinais pareceu-lhes de bom alvitre aprisioná-lo até certo tempo.
arabic: ثُمَّ بَدَا لَهُم مِّنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا رَأَوُاْ ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَيَسۡجُنُنَّهُۥ حَتَّىٰ حِينٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: thumma badā lahum min baʿdi mā ra-awū al-āyāti layasjununnahu ḥattā ḥīnin
